candidateMessage.message: To apply, just complete this simple form. Best of luck!

resumeRule.message: Providing a resume is great, but if you don't have one, just leave us a video recording instead

itemsRule.name: nursingCert
itemsRule.question: C1 nursing certificate
itemsRule.prompt: Please scan and attach your C1 as pdf

itemsRule.name: coverLetter
itemsRule.question: Cover Letter
itemsRule.prompt: Please upload a cover letter. The shorter the better

itemsRule.name: favoriteColor
itemsRule.question: Favorite color
itemsRule.prompt: Tell us your favorite color. Our advanced hiring algorithm uses it.

itemsRule.name: letters
itemsRule.question: Letters
itemsRule.prompt: How many letters are in this sentence?
